entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
